section.title: Tutorial: How to display two items in a ListView
section.para: You can use the SimpleAdapter class to show the data of two elements. This class expects a Array of Strings ( from data) in which the fields of the input data are defined. It also requires a Array of ints which defines the IDs of the widgets in the layout for the row to which these fields are mapped.
The actual data is then a list of Maps. The Map defines for each field in the from data a value.
The following shows an example which reuses an predefined layout from Android for the row.
